title: Thermal inversions lead to respiratory irritation

content.question: Which of the following describes a potential human health effect most likely to be associated with a thermal inversion?

choices.label: Increase in respiratory irritation due to increased levels of fine airborne particulates
Increase in skin cancer due to increased ozone levels
Increase in allergies due to increased household mold
Increase in infant mortality due to increased atmospheric CO2 levels
Increase in heart attacks due to increased barometric pressure

content.answer: Increase in respiratory irritation due to increased levels of fine airborne particulates

skill.text: Skill 1.C: Explain environmental concepts, processes, or models in applied contexts.
